issue.title: [C++] arrow-threading-utility-test takes a long time
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11968](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11968). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Nowadays arrow-threading-utility-test takes ~20 seconds (or much longer on Valgrind). It would be good to reduce its runtime.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11968?focusedCommentId=17302158) by yibocai#1 (yibocai#1):*
A quick test on my side. Looks 80% time is in sleeping.

```bash

$ time release/arrow-threading-utility-test
....
real    0m5.389s
user    0m1.106s
sys     0m0.207s
```
